website_summaries.verdict: Your best bet if you're struggling to find an undermount sink to fit your small vanity.
pros: A great fit for smaller vanities
cons: Some have complained about its size

customer_reviews.title: I love this sink!
customer_reviews.text: These sinks are not only beautiful but are wonderful for those who may have an 18" deep vanity which was very hard to find sinks to fit. There is plenty of room for a faucet and still 3+ inches towards the front. The bowl is nice and deep and water does not stand in the bottom. I would highly recommend, I have 3 of them.
customer_reviews.author: PB_J

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for a tight space
customer_reviews.text: Finding right size sink for a smaller vanity is not easy. After searching many places and looking through many options we settled for this one because of the size, depth and shape. Needless to say Amazon customer reviews helped us a lot. The sink is perfect for our 18" deep vanity. We are totally satisfied with the purchase. Including couple of pictures...
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT use template to cut your holes.
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT use template to cut your holes. I should have known better. I bought 4 of these and all four are a different size/shape. The only consistency is that all of them were smaller than them provided template. :( Nice sink, but don't provide a template if it doesn't match the sink. At least that way I would have made my own template, and ended up with openings that matched the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Landry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for months now for a small bathroom sink to fit our small vanity in our guest bathroom (max cut out measurements were not to exceed 16 inches wide). This arrived yesterday and it came in 3 boxes (one inside of the other) and was fully protected! It arrived in perfect condition! It's the perfect size! Exactly 16 inches wide! Most importantly, this sink came with a template which was a must for us because our top was custom made. If you want more counter space and less sink, this is it! I love it! Excuse the towel in the photo! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect for the cabinet we ordered and we loved the rectangular shape. Just know you get what you pay for. The porcelain finish is nice but very uneven around the lip of the sink, so make sure to check each sink before you template the cutout. We used the template provided in the box and you can see unfinished material under the countertop. I trying to figure out how to touch it up - porcelain touch up? We'll see. My husband says I'm too picky, but it's what I see when I walk in.....
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Been waiting TWO months for a refund
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two sinks and only one sink was delivered. The one sink we received is great and exactly what we wanted. We reached out and received a nice email, bu after email and phone call attempts, no refund has been received after 2 months. This is the email we received from DeCorPlanet Customer Service: "Hi there- We apologise for the shipping carrier misplacing 1 of the sinks. Are you requesting a refund or a replacement at this time? Please feel free to contact us again with any other questions you may have. Thank you and have a nice day. Sincerely, DecorPlanet Customer Service"
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Halcomb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sink
customer_reviews.text: These sinks came well packaged, fast shipping and were just right for our standard double vanity. The color is bright white, not cream. Installed easily and allowed for more counter space. The finish is decent. All the sinks were too large or creamish white at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: streicher

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful sinks at any price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sinks when my contractor informed me that the $300.00 sinks I had purchased would not fit in my new cabinetry! I was nervous about ordering sinks without seeing them, but I really needed them fast and I was unable to hit the streets on a new search, so I ordered these! They arrived earlier than predicted and they are PERFECT!! I am so glad that the original sinks were too large; I have two beautiful sinks that cost less than one of the originals!!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Stewart

customer_reviews.title: great bargain
customer_reviews.text: this sink was the lowest priced rectangular sink i could find online anywhere. especially considering the low price, the quality is wonderful. they are a bit on the smaller side though--especially the vertical side. it looked a bit different when installed but now I actually prefer it because it allows for much more counter space, especially since we changed our bathroom from a 1 to 2 sink counter. all in all great product and i even had our granite person comment on how nice these were. minus 1 star because they do look smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.author: papilion25

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Bathroom Sink
customer_reviews.text: Great sink! It was very inexpensive but it's very high quality with a beautiful thick finish on it. The Nantucket name badge looks nice as well. The packaging that it came in was extremely impressive. It was double boxed in very thick heavy duty cardboard boxes, with tightly-cut foam panels around the sink itself. No chance of these ever breaking during transit, they have this packaging down to a science. I've only been using it for a couple weeks but I'm very happy with it so far and it was under $70.
customer_reviews.author: Mista C

customer_reviews.title: Poor fabrication and QC
customer_reviews.text: Used two of these on a double vanity. After a lot of research as to why my drains wouldn't stop leaking at the sink to gasket connection and multiple calls to Pfister about there defective draining was discovered that the issues were with the sinks one had a small void at the base and the other had rigid edges that didn't allow the gaskets to seal completely. The QC is subpar and I have two sinks to prove it.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great for narrow vanities
customer_reviews.text: These sinks are fantastic! They fit our 18" x 60" bathroom vanity beautifully, are nice and deep, and work well for all your bathroom needs. I really like the smaller size which allows me to maximize top counter space. The have a very nice, high quality white finish. Our contractor was impressed with quality and price. They arrived on time in very sturdy packaging with no quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Frederi

customer_reviews.title: This Is  Best Sink For Small Areas. Look No Further
customer_reviews.text: I order a few sinks to see which one would work best for my dressing room. The others the descriptions were not as statement.l and had to be returned. This sink is the best. It’s the perfect size. The templete it canes with is excellent for your stone fabulator to cut . It has the under mount brackets and the quality and size of just perfect. This is the best sink for smaller areas. You won’t be disaappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Flick

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these sinks. The include template has a disclaimer that says not to trust the template. Sure enough all three sinks are slightly different sizes, and furthermore are not quite rectangular, but have a slight curve. They looked nice enough upon arrival, but considering the extra labor involved to use these under a concrete counter one might consider a different manufacture. Too late to return, I will use them and suffer the extra effort. I'll repost once I get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Davis

customer_reviews.title: Smaller sized bathroom sink
customer_reviews.text: WE bought this sink because of the size of cabinet in our bathroom. In remodeling the space I kept with the previous size, which required a smaller size from front to back to allow for enough room for the faucet to sit comfortably. This sink was slightly wider than a previous purchase in another room, but both are plenty big for all uses in bathroom cleanup. I like the shape and size of this sink, and it looks great in our new cabinet with quartz countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Laurise M.

customer_reviews.title: The sinks look nice overall. Don't use the template that's supplied
customer_reviews.text: The sinks look nice overall. Don't use the template that's supplied. The cutout should probably be 1/4"-1/2" smaller all the way around. After install, a small amount of unglazed ceramic was still visible. I caulked it and it matches pretty closely, but could have been avoided all together.
customer_reviews.author: david wolters

customer_reviews.title: There is a small removable chrome color overflow ring that is a nice touch, if you have chrome
customer_reviews.text: I only had 20 inches to work with since my cabinet had "walls" under the counter. It doesn't look small to me and it's on a 59" counter. The color is bright white for those that are wondering. I have a bright Kholer white toilet and this looks bright Kholer white. There is a small removable chrome color overflow ring that is a nice touch, if you have chrome. I have oil rubbed bronze so took mine out. The first sink arrived broken in several pieces, but Amazon sent out another right away. Water doesn't pool at the bottom. Love this sink. Update, I now have 2 of these sinks, I prefer the push drain.
customer_reviews.author: melissa f

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sink for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: This sink looks wonderful and fits perfectly in my 33" long x 18" deep vanity. Since the vanity isn't very deep, my concern was having enough room to fit the faucets in back of the sink. This sink proved to be exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ann K

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. It’s not a large sink but I’ve never seen the need for those overly large sinks in a bathroom. I’d rather have more counter space. The rectangular shape is a nice change from round sinks and it’s a nice bright white without blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: jillybean

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect directions
customer_reviews.text: Sink is fine and was packaged well. However the template to cut the countertop was a different shape then the sink. The sink has L shaped corners and the template had rounded corners. Wasted our first counter top since the template is wrong so we had to recut another countertop. And we did not receive any directions on how to use the included mounting hardware...
customer_reviews.author: kathy scott

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Upon unboxing, the Nantucket 16x11 came with no flaws and was packed very well with double boxes and double rigid foam on all sides, including top and bottom. We wanted a small sink to maximize the countertop of a custom vanity we had installed. We had the Quartz countertop fabricators make their cutout for the sink slightly overlap thus making even more countertop available. This overlap also gave the rectangle sink a more custom look.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Under counter sinks of this size are NOT easy to find but these are great value
customer_reviews.text: Under counter sinks of this size are NOT easy to find but these are great value. I heard vendor had some shipping issues and sure enough one of two sinks we ordered arrived broken as it was packed upside down. Amazon took care of replacing it - no problem. Save the shipping boxes. The sinks look great in our double vanity, they are deep and drain very well. We love them. Have them installed professionally if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For small size bathroom sink
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sink for our non-standard sized vanity which is 18"x31". My husband wanted to get a rectangle sink so badly and this was by far the only one fits our sink top. The quality is great and we are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse Walker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I had a bathroom vanity in a powder room that I was updating and needed a small undermount sink to go with a remnant piece of granite. This sink was perfect for my project. It is very good quality, even has a metal piece over the overflow drain hole to customize it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these sinks for a bathroom remodel. I looked for a somewhat smaller sink because so many sinks nowadays are way larger than I wanted. These were finished nicely, drain holes were centered and they look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R.

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom remodel
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these for my master bath remodel and they look nice with my quartz vanity top. They were cheaper and of the same quality of sinks than those found at a designer store. The packing was top notch with enough styrofoam padding in the box.
customer_reviews.author: MEV

customer_reviews.title: hard to find size, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sink for the size, First sink came in pieces, and the second sink was so far out of square we had to make the opening size a half inch smaller in each direction
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink that solved a tight fit problem.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a very small sink for remodel in 100 year old bathroom. This sink was the smallest rectangular undermount that I could find. Came packaged to endure the apocalypse. Nice finish. Not perfectly straight along undermount edges, making predetermined measurements a little challenging for my specific application. However, I wouldn't hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Hargan

customer_reviews.title: Superb packaging.......beautiful sinks
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these sinks for are in-process-of-being-built home. Each individual sink was packed in a sturdy cardboard box completely lined with solid styrofoam. That box was packed in another heavy box with styro. This box in turn was packed in another box. Fun going into each box like a Christmas present that starts out wrapped big, then ends up smaller and smaller, and is something of value. These sinks are beautiful, with a smooth, glowing finish.
customer_reviews.author: MET

customer_reviews.title: Template Wrong Resulting in Rework
customer_reviews.text: Template for cutting a hole in marble was wrong resulting in complete rework and need to purchase additional marble. Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Emmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but I had to return it, it would’ve been too big for the buffet I bought and we would’ve lost some drawers on the sides. Very nice though, don’t hesitate if you have the room in your vanity for it.
customer_reviews.author: LISA LOUTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The old sink rusted over time so this is a better option, plus you don't need to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: We converted an Antique Buffet cabinet to a double sink vanity. Needed a small size and this worked perfectly. No problem with install. Actually big enough for our needs. The overflow cap is chromed plastic (they included an extra). The old sink rusted over time so this is a better option, plus you don't need to use it as it easily snaps in and out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sink for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was great my vanity requires a smaller sink and it was shipped in layers of packaging for protection didn’t have any issue and love the square modern bowl
customer_reviews.author: C. Helser

customer_reviews.title: love this sink
customer_reviews.text: I tried to buy this at a local store and it was going to be 3-5 weeks until delivery. I received this sink in 2 days and was perfect and cheaper!!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: The vanity in our guest bath is only 62" long and we wanted 2 sinks. These sinks were a perfect fit for that area with 15-1/2 " opening and undermounted. The sinks are well made and beautiful. Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Lovely smaller sinks.
customer_reviews.text: We had to order 4 to get 2 with close dimensions for a double quartz vanity. The fabricator requested the second order. Twice was a charm. Other than the variance issue, these are beautiful sinks! Love the inner shape, the shine and the fact there’s no splashing!
customer_reviews.author: Libbie Park

customer_reviews.title: Templet does not match the sink CAUTION
customer_reviews.text: The templet I received with the sink was too large now I am stuck with the sink and a hole in my granite that is too large I need to find a new sink
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: This was just the ticket for a small bath cabinet--- really great
customer_reviews.text: Right size , perfect fit for an 18 inch bath cabinet -- we were lucky to find it. Don't have a photo to share unfortunately -- looks great in a pale grey cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Beast fan

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I had a sink top with the cut out already and blew my friends mind when I found the sink to fit it on amazon
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I knew the dimensions but didn't expect it to actually be so small. We had to use small sinks due to the configuration of our vanity. Probably fine for a small vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-O-Mite

customer_reviews.title: Good, with reservations
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent sink. The size was the most important do me so we went with it. Some water stays in the bowl, but I can deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: EMP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to purchase based on the reviews but I literally could not be happier that I trusted my gut and purchased this sink. I had it professionally installed by my contractor who did our remodel and it looks amazing. Very elegant, compact with amazing lines and curvature to it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Great Basin. We had a very small powder room and searched for a basin that could fit and still add to the design overall. The piece arrived within a week and intact. The purchase was completely without hassle. Thank you Nantucket.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: No flaws, packaged beautifully, they go the extra mile with packaging for sure. Our counter manufacturers installed the sinks so didn’t rate installation. Sink is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: barbara j adkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sink.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was excellent. Sink is perfect. Beats the crooked low budget junk my contractor bought by a thousand miles. Delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: T. Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sink
customer_reviews.text: I renovated my bathrooms with these and they look great. Easy install, with all the needed mounting brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood

customer_reviews.title: Small is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small bathroom. Client was going crazy (literally) trying to find this smaller size. Found this within 2 minutes, received it in 2 days. Client loves me.
customer_reviews.author: Lory Cole

customer_reviews.title: Nantucket sinks
customer_reviews.text: They are white and pretty but are very small. My vanity guy had to cover a bit on the sides because they are not straight, so if you want a bigger sink it is not a product, but if you want to see you granite or marble countertop and don't need a large sink, it will look very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Sink
customer_reviews.text: These sinks were perfect for our new smaller vanity. Great looking and a high value for the money. Plus they are smart looking too!! Absolutely love them! Highly recommend them too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great sink for shallow vanity
customer_reviews.text: Great option for our 18" deep vanities. If using for that depth of vanity, just check the drain pull if located on faucet - want straight up/down or minimal angle (or just use a pop-up drain) to ensure everything fits comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality/Bargain price
customer_reviews.text: This is really a beautiful sink for the price. I found no defects of any kind and it mounted under my granite countertop without issue. The price was lower than ordering it through the big box store.
customer_reviews.author: beachbroad

customer_reviews.title: Just right for a 48" double vanity
customer_reviews.text: These sinks fit perfectly in a 48" double vanity leaving enough usable counter space
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sink for the $!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sink forvthe $. Small size is ideal for tight installations.
customer_reviews.author: Vizsla_luvr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is exactly what I needed! Small area, I had to have an 18" depth cabinet cut down. Bought 2 Kohler oval sinks and neither would work. This sink is perfect for my needs and is priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smaller sink!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a smaller rectangular sink and this worked out perfectly! Came extremely well packaged and is as described. Had it installed with our new vanity top and it's lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Sinks!!
customer_reviews.text: Came packed in 3 boxes. No damage. Exactly what I thought from the pictures. Very happy with the sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennette Powell

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Received item quicker than anticipated. Used for a small bathroom remodel this sink fit perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Przybylski

customer_reviews.title: Nantucket Sink,As good of quality as the large manufacturers.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good finish. This sink matches the quality of Kohler, American Standard or others at less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: jim paulson

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions did not hold to stated specifications even considering stated variable.
customer_reviews.text: This sink did not hold true to measurements. I had to return it. I broke my existing sink and was replacing it. Did not fit existing opening.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick J, McLeod

customer_reviews.title: It's a sink.
customer_reviews.text: Was having trouble finding a small sink to fit my small cabinet, found this fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 19 in vanity
customer_reviews.text: It fits great in our bathroom! Also like it better then the sinks in Menards.
customer_reviews.author: michaelae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sink for a smaller bathroom...Great Quality and Look!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on the weekend. I received it Tues! It looks like it will be perfect! Very well packed! Nice finish. Great size for my narrow space! Thank you Amazon once again from a very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: artMom

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a smaller than normal sink?  This one is great.
customer_reviews.text: This sink worked out really well for our needs because it was small enough to fit into a basement application. I turned an antique sideboard into a sink cabinet to be used in a basement bathroom so we didn't have a lot of space to use big furniture. This sink was small enough yet deep enough and of nice quality to go well with the beautiful antique sideboard.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Cifuentes

customer_reviews.title: SINK CRACKED
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sink, but a small cup dropped into in and the whole sink is now cracked extremely bad. It doesn't pay when you try to get a cheaper item.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sink .. looks better than the one I got in the local shop
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good but can be found much cheaper locally.
customer_reviews.text: Good sink, cheap plastic overflow flange. This item is more than twice the cost of similar (as in, identical) sinks we found locally at large stone outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Luci Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for that small are a xcellent quality. Great price! Come in many sizes. Go to their web site first.....
customer_reviews.author: Super picky

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sink for a small width bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the amount of room the bowl has and the fact that my countertop installer installed it for free. Loved the way it looks with the rest of the bathroom. IT is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, cleans great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sink for small counters! They look great and clean great!
customer_reviews.author: love to read

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for lavatory. Looks good...under counter mount. All is good!
customer_reviews.author: Geo Runner

customer_reviews.title: installed easily and looks great in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time, installed easily and looks great in my bathroom. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: MCatherineC

customer_reviews.title: Great sink at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sink. Came packaged perfect and fits in our small bathroom vanity. I highly recommend. I may even buy for my upstairs bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum PI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: A great sink for our half bath. Small and fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Holman

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected...
customer_reviews.text: Was smaller than expected but that was our fault. Make sure you realize this is not the standard sized sink. But it is beautiful and shipped in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tchad

customer_reviews.title: a good quality,  smaller size undermount sink
customer_reviews.text: i have a relatively small vanity with double sinks, so i didnt want two huge sinks. these were the perfect size sink. quality of the product is very good. i would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: G. Koscal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I recently had two of these installed in a very narrow bathroom vanity and they look amazing. I am very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was great! I think it had the chip before shipping
customer_reviews.text: had a chip underneath, but don't think it will affect the seal. The packaging was great! I think it had the chip before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: ralph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sink for my new 18” deep cabinet. The sink was packaged very well with no issues during shipment. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my vanity that was cut down from 22" to 19" deep. Even the quartz counter top fabricator liked it.
customer_reviews.author: landjcl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice sink for slightly smaller than standard under-mount installations.
customer_reviews.author: dfhtrhjn

customer_reviews.title: Great rectangular sink
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these rectangular sinks for a 60" vanity. They are perfect for the size. Deep enough for adults to wash hands, face, etc. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: GrinandBaret

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the small sink size that allows for more counter space! Great quality for fair price!
customer_reviews.author: CarolynKansas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. had a narrow vanity (18") so this sink was perfect.; packed great to avoid any breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great small sink perfect for a tiny bathroom ...nicely packaged shipped etc.
customer_reviews.author: tennistime

customer_reviews.title: Best little sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is perfect! Quality is amazing, arrived perfect. I ordered two for a double vanity. Very elegant simple design.
customer_reviews.author: PA Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on purchasing a like-new item. Basically an open box but still brand new. The sink is a nice upgrade from the standard oval sink bowl and good size.
customer_reviews.author: Krtmom

customer_reviews.title: Sink arrived in perfect condition and has been mounted to a black quartz ...
customer_reviews.text: Sink arrived in perfect condition and has been mounted to a black quartz counter top and looks amazing. Bathroom reno is now complete but the vanity and sink are ready to install in the next few days. Have had a difficult time waiting for all the work to come to competion.
customer_reviews.author: sharon jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it's a nice sink. Proportions are fairly true. Color is not snow white, but more akin to china white. Chris W., Birmingham, Al
customer_reviews.author: chris waldrop

customer_reviews.title: these are perfect. Just the right size imo
customer_reviews.text: I only have space for a 60 inch vanity but wanted a double sink, these are perfect. Just the right size imo. The ones i bought from home depot would have take away too much counter space.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Spot on
customer_reviews.text: Arrived perfect, true white and exact size stated. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Looks great underneath my new granite countertops
customer_reviews.text: Installed these in my bathrooms. Very elegant, and sharp. Looks great underneath my new granite countertops.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas M. Woolf

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a 30" vanity with plenty of room on the sides and plenty deep enough. Rectangular yet shaped inside so that no water pools anywhere. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DBL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed the sinks are made in China
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3, all packed well. Minor flaws in finish. One came with chrome ring in overflow 2 did not. Disappointed the sinks are made in China.
customer_reviews.author: ksbb13

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly and were just what I expected. Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This sink fit perfectly in to the depth of a dresser I used as a powder room vanity. Great option for a non-standard use case.
customer_reviews.author: M Rose

customer_reviews.title: One sink had an off-center hole
customer_reviews.text: One sink had an off-center hole. I should have returned but just let it go and you can't really tell. Great price for the quality of the sink and modern, sweet look....
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Stenta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not installed yet but good quality & modern look. Very solid
customer_reviews.author: Wendi P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it...it’s perfect for my powder room in my new home❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Norma Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful in our bathroom with our new granite counter & faucet
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our small powder room ..large enough that I can bath my cat as well
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Lawhon

product_meta.title: Nantucket Sinks UM-16x11-W 16-Inch by 11-Inch Rectangle Ceramic Undermount Vanity, White
product_meta.description:
Size:1-(Pack)Give your home a look that elevates it above others with this small rectangle vanity sink. Slopes sides and a flat bottom give this sink a transitional look.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Give your home a look that elevates it above others with this small rectangle vanity sink. Slopes sides and a flat bottom give this sink a transitional look.
feature_bullets: Exterior Dimensions: 18" x 12.875" (nominal - actual may vary by .25")
Interior Dimensions: 16" x 10.875" (nominal - actual may vary by .25")
Bowl Depth: 5.875 / 7.375 inches. Cabinet Requirements - Fits 21 inch cabinet base minimum
This sink has a 1.75" drain diameter.
